Blast Shower.description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.
Blast Shower.name: Blast Shower

Disposable Missile Launcher.description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.
Disposable Missile Launcher.name: Disposable Missile Launcher

Eccentric Vase.description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
Eccentric Vase.name: Eccentric Vase
Eccentric Vase.flavorText: Create a quantum tunnel between two locations.

Foreign Fruit.description: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.
Foreign Fruit.name: Foreign Fruit

Fuel Array.description: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...
Fuel Array.name: Fuel Array
Fuel Array.flavorText: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...

Gnarled Woodsprite.description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.
Gnarled Woodsprite.name: Gnarled Woodsprite
Gnarled Woodsprite.flavorText: Heal over time. Activate to send to an ally.

Milky Chrysalis.description: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.
Milky Chrysalis.name: Milky Chrysalis

Ocular HUD.description: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
Ocular HUD.name: Ocular HUD
Ocular HUD.flavorText: Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

Preon Accumulator.description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.
Preon Accumulator.name: Preon Accumulator
Preon Accumulator.flavorText: Fire a ball of energy that electrocutes nearby enemies before detonating.

Primordial Cube.description: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds
Primordial Cube.name: Primordial Cube
Primordial Cube.flavorText: Fire a black hole that draws enemies in.

Radar Scanner.description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.
Radar Scanner.name: Radar Scanner

Royal Capacitor.description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.
Royal Capacitor.name: Royal Capacitor
Royal Capacitor.flavorText: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster.

The Back-up.description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.
The Back-up.name: The Back-up
The Back-up.flavorText: Call drones for back up. Lasts 25 seconds.

The Crowdfunder.description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.
The Crowdfunder.name: The Crowdfunder
The Crowdfunder.flavorText: Toggle to fire. Costs gold per bullet.

Volcanic Egg.description: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.
Volcanic Egg.name: Volcanic Egg
Volcanic Egg.flavorText: Transform into a speeding draconic fireball, dealing damage as you pass through enemies.

Effigy of Grief.description: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20.
Effigy of Grief.name: Effigy of Grief
Effigy of Grief.flavorText: Drop an effigy that cripples ALL characters inside. Can be picked back up.

Glowing Meteorite.description: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.
Glowing Meteorite.name: Glowing Meteorite
Glowing Meteorite.flavorText: Rain meteors from the sky, hurting both enemies and allies.

Helfire Tincture.description: Ignite ALL characters within 8m. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.
Helfire Tincture.name: Helfire Tincture
Helfire Tincture.flavorText: Burn everything nearby... including you and allies.

Spinel Tonic.description:
Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.

When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).
Spinel Tonic.name: Spinel Tonic
Spinel Tonic.flavorText: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats. Chance to gain an affliction that reduces ALL stats.
